name: Beta Movement Demo
description:
This is a work in progress, and due to this, any feedback is appreciated. 

This is my first-person movement-based platformer. Your objective is to open and get to the exit gate as quickly as possible. 

Controls:

Right-click - Forward Dash

Left-Click - Down Dash

Left Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump (Hit twice for double jump)

                 Climb Walls

R - Restart Level

C - Restart at checkpoint

Esc - Pause

_____________________________________________________________________

I'm going to be continually updating this project and welcome feedback. So look forward to future updates and hopefully enjoy.
